about_the_game:
Elephant Games AR returns with a case that could change the meaning of the name Holmes for good in Ms. Holmes: The Milverton Plot!

Following in your famous uncle’s footsteps has always been a point of pride for you, but that could all change when a newspaper calls his reputation into question! A mysterious informant claims the great Sherlock Holmes was a fraudulent criminal, and they’ve got evidence to prove it. But could your uncle have really worked with the culprits he fought to put behind bars, or is someone trying to rewrite history for their own gain? With your family’s legacy at stake, it’s up to you to find the truth! So, gather your wits to crack the case in this thrilling Hidden-Object Puzzle adventure!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version.

The Collector’s Edition includes:

  • Help Sharlotte Holmes uncover how Dorothy’s mother died in the bonus chapter!

  • Find clever collectibles and puzzle pieces! Assemble a bonus puzzle in the Secret Room!

  • Enjoy screensavers, wallpapers, and music from the game!

  • Never get lost with the strategy guide!

This is a Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game, meaning a specific genre of story-driven, point & click adventures. Throughout the game, players are tasked to find a list of objects hidden within a particular scene, and to occasionally complete various mini-games/puzzles.
